Issue.creator: jlaw 1
Issue.summary: CLI reports wrong message when trying to connect to LIVE
Issue.description: connect live The information required to connect this client to the nodes cannot be found. This is an error. To correct the error, get the file containing genesis transactions (the file name is `pool_transactions_sandbox`) from the github repository and place it in directory `/home/jlaw/.sovrin`. The github url is https://github.com/sovrin-foundation/sovrin-client/tree/stable/data. {quote} It references pool_transactions_sandbox. It should reference pool_transactions_live. >
